547060.name: Fantasy Grounds - Map Pack: Lake Keep
547060.description:
Lake Keep

A small keep situated on a lake or a river. The keep consists of 4 floors and a cellar, all fully furnished. All maps have a corresponding DM map.
A bonus map is included with the hall tables fully set for a feast. In Total there are 12 maps.
This Map Pack includes:
  • 2nd floor a
  • 2nd floor b
  • 2nd floor DM
  • 3rd floor DM
  • 3rd floor
  • 4th floor DM
  • 4th floor
  • Cellar DM
  • Cellar
  • First floor DM
  • First floor
  • Overview
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
